channel.title: I need a anti-flood 562 please!
channel.description: I need anti-flood for my 562 Please help me ive been flooded 21 times today and my ip-bann doesnt work! Can someone please help me out... Im not good with coding java files so can you help me step by step please!! I only know how to code shops teleports commands etc.... Please someone help me!

item.title: I need a anti-flood 562 please!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“RealVenomPVP, post:1, topic:365337”]I need anti-flood for my 562
Please help me ive been flooded 21 times today and my ip-bann doesnt work! Can someone please help me out… Im not good with coding java files so can you help me step by step please!! I only know how to code shops teleports commands etc… Please someone help me![/quote]
dude, you just said your ipban command doesnt work? and you said you know how to code commands? then code an ip ban command? :o
or just limit the amount of accounts logged from one ip
or try a fire alarm like zone alarm
it has like i forgot what it was called,
outforward filtering? i cant remember, but it supposed to stop mass connections or something, look into it

Read full topic

item.title: I need a anti-flood 562 please!
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Make an array list.
Everytime somebody logs in add their IP to the list.

Check if their IP is on the list before adding it, if so, end their session.

Read full topic
